channel.title: All 317 Methods

Login Screen State aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_834 - stream Instance aClass30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub1_Sub1Array835 - active NPCs anInt836 - Npc Count aString844 - message To Say anInt845 - private Chat Status aBoolean848 - song Is Playing anIntArray864 - current Experience aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_870 - mapFlag aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_871 - mapMarker aBoolean872 - allow Data Input anInt874 - wave Playing anInt877 - Npc ID anInt878 - Packet 156 : Remove item model. Packet 151 : Create world object. Packet 4 : Create a stationary animation. Packet 101 : Create world object. Packet 44 : Create item model. Packet 117 : Projectile graphic creation. Packet 81 : Update Players. Packet 176 : Open the welcome screen. Packet 107 : Resets something to do with camera movement. Packet 214 : Replaces the long array of player names on ignore list with what is read. Packet 166 : Toggle the camera. Packet 134 : Read the skill information. Packet 71 : Read the tab interfaces. Packet 121 : Set music, used less. Packet 109: Logout. Packet 70: Sets the special bar information. Packet 208 : Read the interface ID which the player can still walk. Packet 99 : Read the minimap state. Packet 75 : Npc chat related. Packet 114 : Read server update time. Packet 35 : Shake the screen. Packet 174 : Play a sound effect. Packet 104 : Read the atPlayer right click menu options. Packet 78 : Remove the flag from the minimap. Packet 253 : Read message sent to the player in chatbox. Packet 50 : Read private message info. Packet 110 : Read player energy. Packet 248 : Creates an interface and inventory overlay. Packet 68 : Turn off split private chat. Packet 196 : Send a private message. Packet 85 : Read the X and Y coordinates for next graphic created. Packet 24 : Flash sidebar icons. Packet 246 : Manipulate item images displayed in interfaces. Packet 171 : Add special bar to interface. Packet 142 : Write an interface over the inventory and remove sidebar icons. Packet 126 : Manipulate lines of text in interfaces. Packet 206 : Read player chat options. Packet 240 : Read the player wieght carried. Packet 53 : Write item images to interface. Packet 221 : Private message server status. Packet 177 : Toggle camera view. Packet 249 : Initialize player info. Packet 65 : NPC updating. Packet 27 : Open "Enter Amount" interface. Packet 187 : Open "Enter Username" interface. Packet 218 : Write an interface over the chatbox. Packet 87 : Adjust the valume. Packet 36 : Set button states. Packet 61 : Reset head icons. Packet 219 : Close all open interfaces. Packet 34 : Write inventory items. Packet 106 : Set the current sidebar. Packet 164 : Write an interface over the chat box. method14 - price To K or Million method15 - Stop midi music method16 - Connect to server method18 - Draw chat area method12 - Start runnable method19 - Open sockets method20 - select Menu Option method21 - Save midi method22 - update World Objects method23 - Unlink all method24 - render Map Scene method25 - spawn Ground Item method26 - show Npcs method27 - replay Wave method29 - Select Menu Option UseItem On Other method30 - manage Chat Interface method31 - update NPC method32 - select Bottom Buttons method33 - adjust Volume method34 - handle Head Icons method35 - Remove Friend method36 - draw Tab Interfaces [/code]
I will be making more soon.

item.title: All 317 Methods
item.dc:creator: @pablo2 pablo2
item.description:
@pablo2 wrote:

Nice leach, need proof? Here: http://www.rune - server.org/showthread.php?t=65881 Remove the spaces…

Read full topic

item.title: All 317 Methods
item.dc:creator: @JuzEh JuzEh
item.description:
@JuzEh wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:4, topic:229227”][quote author=Zach 93 link=topic=301528.msg2419769#msg2419769 date=1220281173]
It’s a shame we’re still stuck in the 317.

508’s have arrived, start working on those instead.
[/quote]
whats wrong with 317? its a learning curve[/quote]

What he said.

Read full topic

item.title: All 317 Methods
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Why do people say ALL when it clearly isn’t?

So which method does the linear fill on the screen?

Read full topic
